entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 06:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: E 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing drizzle. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing drizzle. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
